answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Thomas, 
Unfortunately this is an area that the Knowledge Network does not currently have any resources in. However, I was able to find a power point on the Tulsa Asset Management Guide and an accompanying document that explain their asset management initiatives and how they monetized some of them. I hope you find this helpful and that others are able to chime in and provide you with further information. 
http://webapps.icma.org/conference_Handouts/handouts2013/LICMA%20Capstone-Tulsa%20Presentation.ppt1.pdf
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305488
Additionally here is the Asset Management Topic Page with all of the resources on the Knowledge Network related to asset management. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/14/Asset_Management
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Thomas Cox
text: For those organizations who have implemented partnerships with "brokers" on marketing engagements or asset monetization initiatives, what was the revenue split between the municipality and the "broker"?
title: Municipal Marketing Engagements/Asset Monetization Initiatives
